LanguageData.StudyDesk.label: 书桌
LanguageData.StudyDesk.description: 一张可用于学习和研究的桌子。自带所有开局科技（殖民者可以直接在书桌上学习它们而不需要额外写书）。
LanguageData.NetworkTerminal.label: Network Terminal
LanguageData.NetworkTerminal.description: An access point to input and output knowledge between colonists and the research database. Comes with solitaire pre-installed.
LanguageData.BookShelf.label: 书架
LanguageData.BookShelf.description: 一个坚固的架子，用于存放记载知识的书本。
LanguageData.NetworkServer.label: Network Server
LanguageData.NetworkServer.description: The ultimate cloud storage unit to host your research database. All library space you'll ever need.
LanguageData.UnfinishedTechBook.label: 未完成的技术书
LanguageData.TechBook.label: 技术书
LanguageData.TechDrive.label: Technology Database Drive
LanguageData.TechDrive.description: A hard drive filled with knowledge. Can only be archived on a network terminal.
LanguageData.Target.label: 靶子
LanguageData.Target.description: 您的神枪手可以在此磨炼技巧。
LanguageData.MrDummy.label: 训练用假人
LanguageData.MrDummy.description: 用于训练格斗技能的稻草假人。
